name: FruitasticArt
description: FruitasticArt is a digital artist specializing in creating vibrant and playful pop art illustrations. Their colorful and whimsical works transform fruits into charming characters and fantastical landscapes.

works.title: Fruity Island Adventure
works.description: An imaginary island where cute and joyful fruits live adventures. Each section of the island represents a different fruit, creating a vibrant and delicious landscape.

works.title: Pop Art Orchard
works.description: A collection of fruit illustrations in a pop art style. The bright colors and geometric shapes highlight the diversity and beauty of fruits.

works.title: Fruit Fiesta
works.description: A vibrant and repetitive pattern of various fruits on a dark background. This artwork captures the energy and joy of a true fruit fiesta.
